name: The House of Rats
description:
Camera: First Person.

Control: Mouse and Keyboard only.

Graphics: PSX graphics style, inspired by old ps1 games.

Duration: A short game about 15-20 minutes.

NOTE:

The game is only based on a work by "H.P. Lovecraft" but the story has been completely modified to give the game a plot. Based on the setting and horror created by the writer.
